actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs (Subsequently: Energy and Natural Resources)
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs (Subsequently: Energy and Natural Resources).

official_title: A bill to provide financial assistance to utility regulatory bodies and electric utilities to carry out energy conservation demonstration projects.

summary.text: Energy Savings Demonstration Act - Authorizes Federal Energy Administrator to provide financial assistance to utility regulatory bodies and electric utilities for the development of demonstration projects designed to allocate costs of electric energy in a more equitable manner. Authorizes financial assistance for studies of financing methods to assist consumers in jeopardy of losing access to electric power. Authorizes appropriations of $10,000,000 for fiscal year 1978 and $15,000,000 for fiscal year 1979 to carry out the programs authorized by this act.

titles.title: A bill to provide financial assistance to utility regulatory bodies and electric utilities to carry out energy conservation demonstration projects.
